column2: Trip to Bolzano by ESN Trento

column6:
Are you ready for the first day-trip of your Erasmus? Let's start the Welcome Week with the right foot by discovering another beautiful city in the Trentino region!
We will meet with our friends from ESN Bolzano and discover the city with them.
The train ticket is on behalf of the participants, no other fee! We will meet at the train station at 13:00 and catch the train at 13:30.
As soon as we arrive, ESN Bolzano will show us around the town. Afterwards, we'll have a snack/drink all together and be back in Trento before the evening .
NB: the event will be postponed in case of bad weather, we will keep you informed
